A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Saw it and I was pretty disappointed.  I really want to like all Star Wars movies. Rogue One was incredible! The Force Awakens and The Last Jedi were okay.  I wonder how long Disney thinks it can substitute nostalgia in place of  a strong story.  The Last Jedi was way too long.  The Last Jedi was a little boring.  Too many questions with subpar answers in this film. I feel that most legitimate Star Wars fans could have created a frame work for a more interesting trilogy.  I will still watch future installments.  I don't know if I would continue to consider myself a fan.
